data.text: @larry_boi @amandapalmer Larry- really rethink this tweet? Avoiding life for 2 years to eventually get and it was nothing? Jesus christ my man. Folks lost business, kids had no school. Public health is not singular. Its a wide net.

@amandapalmer So all that locking down resulted in the same fate as the rest of the world? Shocking. So silly. Being vax and boosted its a cold. Yawn at this point. Isolating for what? To slow the spread? We really still doing this
@amandapalmer Hope your friends are all okay

@amandapalmer At least you guys avoided it for the last 2 years. Thankfully Omicron is not as bad as the originals. More contagious but not as life threatening for the most part. I had it having  it scared more than they symptoms I had just because of its reputation but it was t bad at all.
@amandapalmer Here's the link. Hope this helps! https://t.co/rnNJccDb4Q
@amandapalmer Gatorade is basically a liter of water, and gandful of sugar, and a pinch of salt. This helps the H2O enter the cells. So any liquids with salt and carbs will hydrate.
@amandapalmer Anything. Getting food from someone is a good method for guilting the sick into eating when they don’t feel like it

@amandapalmer Potato, leek, mushroom and bacon (easy to drop for vegetarian!) savory pie with a veggie broth gravy. I prefer puff pastry top because I’m high maintenance. It’s delicious and amazing and so easy to make! I used a French galette recipe as inspiration and went from there.
@amandapalmer You just gotta do something helpful with those lovely hands haven’t you, Amanda? Bless you, sweetheart. 💜
